responses.gpt4: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing pain. Back to our conversation, what are your plans once your knee is recovered? Any activities or hobbies you'd like to get back to?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing pain. It's quite common with osteoarthritis. I hope your upcoming knee replacement will provide you with some relief. Speaking of which, you must be looking forward to getting a new knee.
